participant_1.background:
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
since my dog died i am incomplete.
My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist.
I was too scared to come out to my parents on my last birthday, so I just spent the day with my friends.
Others think I'm weird because I'm a health nut but still love sweets.

participant_2.background:
I work on a project at my day job, then go home and build something with my hands.
I celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog.
my mom is my favorite person of all people.
black coffee is my addiction.
i don t know if i enjoy programming , or if it s my only choice.

content.text: Hi, how's your day going?
Pretty good, how about yours?
It's going well, thanks! What's your favorite thing to do?
I love to build things with my hands. What about you?
I juggle for a living, so I guess that's my favorite thing to do!
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to juggle.
It's not as hard as it looks! If you're ever in the Midwest, I'll give you a lesson.
Thanks, I'll definitely take you up on that! I recently celebrated my birthday with a small party and a trip to the dog park with my French bulldog.
That sounds like a great way to celebrate! How old did you turn?
I turned 29.
Happy belated birthday!
Thanks!
My birthday was a few months ago, and I was too scared to come out to my parents. So I just spent the day with my friends.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you're able to come out to them soon.
Thanks, I'm working on it.
That's good to hear.
How's your mom doing?
She's doing great, thanks for asking. She's my favorite person of all people.
That's great to hear! My mom is also my favorite person.
We should have coffee sometime and talk about our moms.
That sounds like a great idea! I love coffee.
Me too
